original_title: Former Pakistan PM Imran Khan arrested
original_body_lines: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan has been arrested on charges of corruption. The former Prime Minister was arrested during a court appearance in Pakistan's capital of Islamabad. Khan is the chairman of the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI). Another PTI leader Azhar Mashwani said that the party had given an immediate call for staging protests in the country in opposition to the arrest.
BREAKING: Imran Khan to be released on Pakistan Supreme Court order. Arrest declared illegal
